TextView.android:text: Hello Everyone! I asked few of you students to draw a world map and I have misplaced the list. Can you help me out?
Ma'am I just remember two names. One was Kushagra and second was Vastav.
Yes, may be they can help finding out other names.
How many students do you require ma'am?
Hi! Are you guys facing problems in learning dates in History?
Yes, ma'am. A lot of battles happened on a lot of different dates, it's very confusing.
Guys! I've made a chart for all these dates. It really helped a lot.
Don't worry, I'll teach you all a nice trick to learn dates and names in next class.
Has anybody seen the test copies of class VIII A? I left them on the staffroom table.
No Vishal. But I saw Mr. Dheer this morning carrying a bundle of copies.He might have mistaken your bundle for his.
Okay Thanks a lot Vaishali. I'll check with him.
Hey Vishal ! I have got your bundle, lets exchange them at lunch.
I still have some doubts about todays class.
